hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Prerequisites
# Install apache mesos # Install dependencies sudo yum install -y make git tar wget java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel gcc gcc-c++ patch \ libzip-devel zlib-devel libcurl-devel apr apr-util apr-devel subversion subversion-devel \ cyrus-sasl-md5 python-devel which autoconf automake libtool
# Set environment variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0 export PATH=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0/bin:$PATH export PWD=`pwd`
# Install Maven wget http://apache.parentingamerica.com/maven/maven-3/3.3.9/binaries/apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz tar zxvf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz export PATH=$PWD/apache-maven-3.3.9/bin:$PATH
# Build , configure and install Mesos git clone https://github.com/linux-on-ibm-z/mesos cd mesos/ git checkout 0.28.x ./bootstrap mkdir build cd build ../configure make sudo make install
cd ../../
# Install Apache Zookeeper sudo yum install --nogpgcheck -y git tar wget ant hostname ant-junit cppunit-devel cppunit-doc hamcrest-javadoc hamcrest-demo hamcrest patch xz libtool make sudo yum groupinstall -y "Development tools"
git clone https://github.com/apache/zookeeper cd zookeeper git checkout tags/release-3.4.8
ant compile_jute
cd src/c ACLOCAL="aclocal -I /usr/share/aclocal" autoreconf -if
wget https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12570030/mt_adaptor.c.patch patch src/mt_adaptor.c mt_adaptor.c.patch
./configure && make && sudo make install sudo make distclean
cd ../../ ant jar
cd ..
## Building and Installing Chronos
# 1. Install the Dependencies sudo yum -y install wget tar git gcc gcc-c++ make java-1.8.0-openjdk
# 2. Set environment variables for MAVEN export MAVEN_HOME=$PWD/apache-maven-3.3.9
# 3. Build and install Node git clone https://github.com/andrewlow/node.git cd node/ ./configure make sudo make install
cd ..
# 4. Start Zookeeper by doing the following:
cd zookeeper
echo ' # The number of milliseconds of each tick tickTime=2000 # the directory where the snapshot is stored. # do not use /tmp for storage, /tmp here is just # example sakes. dataDir=/tmp/zookeeper # the port at which the clients will connect clientPort=2181 ' > conf/zoo.cfg
bin/zkServer.sh start
cd ..
# 5. Start mesos master and slave(s)
cd mesos/build
nohup ./bin/mesos-master.sh --ip=127.0.0.1 --work_dir=/var/lib/mesos &
sleep 10
# Start mesos slave. nohup ./bin/mesos-slave.sh --master=127.0.0.1:5050 &
sleep 10
cd ..
# 6. Build Chronos git clone https://github.com/mesos/chronos.git cd chronos mvn package sed -e '/service zookeeper start/ s/^/#/' -i bin/start-chronos.bash sleep10 nohup bin/start-chronos.bash --http_port 4400 & sleep 30 wget localhost:4400
